source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

Transmogrified to:
Wild Gladiator's Scaled Chestpiece

spell.description: Use: Increase your speed for a few seconds. (2 Min Cooldown)

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Wild Gladiator's Girdle of Victory

Transmogrified to:
Wild Gladiator's Scaled Legguards

Transmogrified to:
Wild Gladiator's Warboots of Prowess

spells.description:
Use: Inject a medicinal frostfire formula into your veins, instantly healing you for up to 5 million from a jolt of frost. To prevent sudden hypothermia, you will then burn for 30% of the amount healed.

Shares a cooldown with healing potions. (5 Min Cooldown)
Equip: When the tinker slotted within this device malfunctions, a fuse is flipped to prevent a hazardous outcome.

Transmogrified to:

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Wild Gladiator's Scaled Gauntlets

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,383 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,546 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 198 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

spell.description: Use: Reduces your falling speed for 2 min. (3 Min Cooldown)

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

item.name: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

spells.description: Use: Suffuses the wearer with the Light. (30 Min Cooldown)

description: May you always bring light into dark places.
